div.span: 4-21-2020 Update Letter Gov. Baker School Closing from Dr Azar. Click the link 4-17-20 Update Letter

span.style: min-height: 80px; cursor: pointer; width: 854.938px; display: block; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

span.span: In an effort to assist the DRRSD Community, the District has released an "Extended Learning" Website for students and parents to get educational resources. Please understand that this site will be changing as we add more resources. You will find the site at this link:

p.span:
4-17-2020 Update Letter from Dr Azar. Click the link 4-17-20 Update Letter (PDF)
4-9-2020 Update April Vacation Letter from Dr Azar. Click the link 4-9-20 April Vacation Letter (PDF)
4-6-2020 The latest update from Dr. Azar regarding Remote Learning Click the link 4-6-20 Remote Learning Plan Letter (PDF)
4-2-2020 The latest update from Dr. Azar regarding Grading Expectation for Families Click the link 4-2-20 Grading Expectations for Families Letter (PDF)
4-2-2020 A letter from Dr. Azar regarding "what's Good Wednesday's" Click the link 4-2-20 What's Good Wednesday's Letter (PDF)
3-30-2020 The latest update from Dr. Azar regarding DESE COVID 19 update Click the link 3-30-20 Distance Learning Update Letter (PDF)
3-26-2020 The latest update regarding Distance Learning in response to Gov Baker May Closure. Click the link 3-26-20 Distance Learning Update Letter (PDF)
3-25-2020 The latest update regarding Gov Baker May Closure. Click the link 3-25-20 Gov Baker Letter (PDF)
3-23-2020 The latest update regarding DRRSD Extended Learning Grab and Go FAQs Letter. Click the link 3-23-20 Extended Learning Grab and Go Letter (PDF)
3-20-2020 The latest update regarding DRRSD Extended Learning Letter. Click the link 3-20-20 Extended Learning Letter (PDF)
3-19-2020 The latest update regarding DRRSD Meal Plan Notification Click the link 3-19-20 Meal Plan Letter (PDF)
3-17-2020 The Latest update regarding Student Resources for "Extended Learning" Click the link 3-17-20 Update Parent Letter (PDF)
3-16-2020 The Latest update regarding the Coronavirus (Covid19) Click the link 3-16-20 Update Parent Letter (PDF)
3-15-2020 Dr. Azar's latest update regarding the Coronavirus (Covid19) Click the link 3-15-20 Update Parent Letter
